data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus - iOS 12 & iPad Air 2 - iOS 12.1 Public Beta 2
data.expected_result: Push notification should open the profile (or chat with) of the user.
data.short_description: Push notifications for accepted friend requests no longer open the profile of the user
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a friend request to any user - Close the app - Let the user whom you have sent a friend request accept it - Click on the push notification for the accepted friend request
